channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 9:11 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 9:11 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 19:41 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 🟢 19:41 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
